nodes.title: How to buy crypto
nodes.subtitle: Peruse the ways MetaMask makes buying crypto speedy, simple, and secure.

image.title: How to buy crypto
image.description: Explore the ways MetaMask makes buying crypto speedy, simple, and secure.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Wondering how to buy crypto, but not sure where to start? You’ve come to the right place. Buying crypto with MetaMask is swift, seamless, and safe. You can use methods like a credit card, debit card, bank account, Apple Pay, Google Pay, or PayPal. No need for centralized exchanges. We’ve cut out all of the unnecessary steps — saving you time, and money on excess fees too.

Below, we'll give you an overview of how we make MetaMask wallet powerful, secure, and configurable when you buy cryptocurrencies. Then, you'll find videos and step-by-step guides showing you exactly how to buy crypto with MetaMask on your browser or mobile app.

Let's get into it! 🦊

How MetaMask empowers you when buying crypto

  • Buy crypto straight into your MetaMask wallet.
  • Choose the best quote from our industry-leading aggregator.
  • Avoid centralized exchanges, extra steps, and additional costs.
  • Use MetaMask wallet in 188 countries with over 80 currencies available.
  • Select from hundreds of your favorite tokens across 15+ networks including: Ethereum, Linea, Optimism, BNB Chain, Polygon, zkSync, Base, Arbitrum, and Avalanche.
  • Go from cash to crypto back to cash. All in one place.

How MetaMask wallet keeps you secure when buying crypto

  • Get 24/7 help whenever you need it from our expert customer service team.
  • We only work with trusted providers, ensuring that they comply with applicable regulations and are legitimate, responsible parties.
  • Preserving your privacy is paramount: MetaMask does not store — nor do we have access to — any personal information you provide when buying or selling crypto, such as payment details, personal data, or email addresses.
  • Unlike a centralized exchange, neither MetaMask nor our partners have access to the cryptocurrencies after you purchase or transfer them, meaning you can access your assets immediately without a holding period.

How MetaMask wallet gives you choice buying crypto

  • Choose your preferred way to buy crypto using: debit card, credit card, bank transfer, instant ACH, PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, Ideal, SEPA bank transfers, and alternative local payment methods. These are subject to availability based on your region.
  • Select your preferred quote and provider.
  • You can buy crypto using MetaMask Portfolio on desktop or the MetaMask app on mobile.

If you’re using MetaMask Extension:

Clicking the Buy & Sell button on the MetaMask extension will redirect you to MetaMask Portfolio. Once there, connect your MetaMask wallet.

  1. Click Move crypto
  2. Click Buy.
  3. Select your region, and currency — located to the right of your wallet address.
  4. Select payment method.
  5. Select the token and network you want to purchase on. Example: ETH on Ethereum.
  6. Enter the amount desired in your local currency. Example: $100 of ETH.
  7. Select the best real-time quote from our industry-leading providers.
  8. You'll be securely redirected to the provider's website to complete the purchase, and funds will be deposited in your MetaMask wallet.

Success! 🦊

If you’re using the MetaMask mobile app:

  1. Sign-in to your MetaMask app.
  2. Tap the menu button, which has two arrows in opposite directions and is located on the bottom of your homepage screen.
  3. Tap Buy
  4. Select your region and currency—this is located to the right of your wallet address.
  5. Select the crypto token and network that you want to buy. Example: ETH on Ethereum.
  6. Enter the crypto amount you want to buy. Example: 0.5 ETH.
  7. Select the payment method you want to use to buy crypto. Example: debit card, credit card, bank account, or PayPal balance. Availability will depend on your region.
  8. Tap Get quotes to proceed. Select the best quote from our industry-leading providers.
  9. Complete the transaction on the provider’s portal, and link your desired payment method.
  10. Review the order summary in your MetaMask app, and confirm the transaction to get crypto in your wallet.

Success! 🦊

**Ready to get started? If you’re on desktop, download MetaMask Extension. If you’re on mobile, download the MetaMask app for iOS or Android.

Need more help? We got you. Head to MetaMask Support to speak with our team of experts around-the-clock.

nodes.metaDescription: Explore the ways to buy crypto directly using your debit card, credit card, PayPal, and bank account with MetaMask wallet.

nodes.title: Come vendere criptovalute in cambio di contanti con MetaMask
nodes.subtitle: La funzione di vendita del portafoglio di MetaMask ti consente di vendere criptovalute in contanti tramite fornitori verificati, in pochi clic.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
La funzione di vendita di MetaMask Portfolio ti consente di incassare facilmente le criptovalute in valuta legale (USD, EUR, GBP). In combinazione con la funzione Acquista, ti consente di avere un'esperienza web3 in autonomia con meno intermediari e una conversione in valuta legale più rapida direttamente alla destinazione prescelta, ove disponibile, come il tuo conto bancario o saldo PayPal.


Fornitori di criptovalute verificati


Piuttosto che limitarsi a un singolo fornitore, MetaMask aggrega una serie di fornitori verificati (molti dei quali sono nella sezione flusso di Acquista) — assicurando che soddisfino i propri elevati standard — così da presentarti diverse opzioni in tempo reale per convertire i tuoi ETH su Ethereum Mainnet nella valuta legale di tua scelta (ove disponibile).

Un pubblico globale


La funzione di vendita è attualmente disponibile negli Stati Uniti (si applicano restrizioni statali), nel Regno Unito e in alcune parti d'Europa con piani di espansione in altre regioni per soddisfare la nostra comunità mondiale. Garantire agli utenti un modo per entrare e uscire liberamente dalle criptovalute è importante e speriamo che queste opzioni lo rendano web3 possibile per più persone. Inizialmente supportiamo ETH su Ethereum Mainnet, con l'intenzione di espanderci presto ai token gas nativi sulle reti di livello 2 e alle valute legali USD, EUR e GBP.

Come utilizzare la funzione Vendi criptovalute su MetaMask Portfolio:


Per vendere le tue criptovalute in cambio di contanti:

  1. Collega il tuo wallet MetaMask a portfolio.metamask.io
  2. Clicca sulla scheda “Vendi” per iniziare
  3. Seleziona la tua regione
  4. Seleziona il token cripto e la rete da cui vuoi vendere (ad esempio: ETH su Ethereum)
  5. Seleziona la destinazione del conto in valuta legale disponibile nella tua ubicazione (ad esempio: conto bancario o saldo PayPal)
  6. Inserisci l'importo in criptovalute che desideri vendere (ad esempio: 0,5 ETH)
  7. Tutte le quotazioni dei diversi fornitori disponibili verranno presentate in tempo reale. Selezionane una per continuare.
  8. Verrai reindirizzato in modo sicuro al sito Web del fornitore per registrarti e collegare il tuo conto in valuta legale, e poi verrai indirizzato di nuovo su MetaMask Portfolio.
  9. Seleziona "Invia ETH a [fornitore]" per inviare criptovalute dal tuo wallet al tuo conto in valuta legale.
  10. Conferma la transazione nel tuo portafoglio MetaMask.
  11. Potrai tenere traccia del tuo ordine mentre viene elaborato nella scheda "Vendi". Le tempistiche variano a seconda del fornitore e potrebbero essere necessari alcuni giorni prima di visualizzare i fondi nel tuo conto in valuta legale.

Operazione riuscita! 🦊

Ottimizzato con i fornitori


L'utilizzo delle funzioni Acquista e Vendi su MetaMask Portfolio ti consente di "chiudere il cerchio" nel tuo viaggio nelle criptovalute e valute legali, con molti degli stessi fornitori. Ciò significa che dovrai registrarti e collegare il tuo conto bancario solo una volta con un fornitore specifico. Ci auguriamo che queste funzionalità ti piacciano.

Sei pronto a provarlo? Scopri di più su metamask.io/portfolio/.

MetaMask Portfolio: traccia e gestisci tutto del tuo web3

MetaMask Portfolio fornisce una piattaforma completa e intuitiva per soddisfare le tue esigenze del web3 e darti il controllo. Grazie a Dashboard, Acquista, Swap, Bridge e Stake, non hai nulla di cui preoccuparti. Lavoriamo incessantemente per migliorare e sviluppare la DApp con aggiornamenti significativi. Clicca qui per saperne di più su MetaMask Portfolio e le sue funzionalità.

nodes.metaTitle: Come vendere criptovalute in cambio di contanti con MetaMask
nodes.metaDescription: Scopri come vendere criptovalute in cambio di contanti con MetaMask e converti le tue criptovalute in valuta legale con fornitori verificati.

nodes.title: Transfers from Coinbase and Binance now available in MetaMask
nodes.subtitle: MetaMask launches new CEX transfer feature to make your wallet more powerful.

image.title: Centralized exchange transfers MetaMask now available
image.description: Centralized exchange transfers from Coinbase and Binance now available on MetaMask.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
MetaMask Portfolio now supports centralized exchange (CEX) transfers from Coinbase and Binance, streamlining the process of transferring assets to your crypto wallet.

Many web3 users have digital assets divided across multiple wallets and accounts, creating a fragmented experience. Moving assets from one platform to another can be overly complicated and involve many steps—fraught with the risks of copying and pasting addresses incorrectly, and potential security concerns. MetaMask’s new CEX transfer feature is a solution to this issue, making your wallet more powerful, while also strengthening security.

Instant transfer of assets from centralized exchanges into your MetaMask wallet

MetaMask CEX transfers allow you to immediately move assets between accounts, eliminating the need for manually entering addresses. And, if you have bank accounts linked to your Coinbase or Binance accounts, purchasing crypto directly with your bank account to your MetaMask wallet has never been easier. No additional KYC necessary.

In April 2024, MetaMask partnered with Meld and Mesh to launch a feature that allowed users to track external CEX balances by linking Coinbase or Binance accounts directly from the MetaMask Portfolio dashboard. Now, you can view CEX balances, and also transfer assets from these exchanges into your MetaMask wallet. Neither MetaMask, nor our partners in this integration, will ever have access to your exchange login credentials, or share your wallet addresses with third parties.

CEX transfers will initially support Coinbase or Binance accounts, with expansion to additional exchanges on the horizon. No fees will be charged when transferring digital assets from exchanges to MetaMask. A nominal transaction fee of 0.25% will be applied when transferring from MetaMask to centralized exchanges. Network gas fees also apply.

By bridging the gap between self-custodial and centralized platforms, MetaMask is paving the way for a more powerful, integrated, and user-friendly DeFi ecosystem. Head to MetaMask Portfolio today to get started with CEX transfers.

nodes.metaDescription: MetaMask launches new CEX transfer feature to make your wallet more powerful.

nodes.title: Empowering gamers in web3
nodes.subtitle: Discover the builders who are transforming web3, in our More With MetaMask Partner Series.

image.title: More With MetaMask Partner Series Yooldo
image.description: More With MetaMask Partner Series Yooldo gaming

childMarkdownRemark.html:
MetaMask is the gateway to the decentralized web, enabling you to do more. Users can connect to any dapp, on any network, from any device. From DeFi to DeSci, gaming to NFTs, and beyond: MetaMask is passionate about the web3 community. The More With MetaMask Partner Series shines a light on builders who are innovating across web3. For Yooldo – a gaming community focused on security and autonomy – MetaMask is essential.

A new era of web3 gaming

In traditional online gaming, players' assets are controlled by the developer or publisher, and stored on centralized servers. This setup leaves users at risk of losing access to their digital items, which can happen for various reasons including a company modifying its policies, or shutting down the game. In web3 gaming, players have full ownership of their digital assets, independent of the game itself. This decentralization ensures that Yooldo gamers have complete control over their assets, with no monolithic authority able to restrict access or manipulate users’ holdings.

How MetaMask keeps gaming assets safe

With self-custody comes gamers' responsibility for maintaining safety of their own assets. The decentralized security that MetaMask offers is vital for Yooldo gamers. Users have control over their private keys, which means that even in the case of a data breach, gaming assets will remain secure. All actions on Yooldo are also transparent and traceable – whether purchasing an in-game asset, or interacting with the platform. And, each transaction requires user approval, via blockchain’s cryptographic validation and consensus protocols.

Another critical feature that safeguards users is phishing protection, powered by MetaMask and ChainPatrol’s Eth-Phishing-Protect. MetaMask provides in-app warnings, and domain verification systems to protect users from dubious links and attacks. This allows Yooldo gamers to be alerted to potentially malicious websites quickly and efficiently.

Empowering gamers through decentralization

As the web3 ecosystem grows, security is of the utmost importance. Gamers can store, buy, sell, and trade their in-game assets directly, without worrying about data breaches, server failures, or third-party interference. More broadly, MetaMask enables players to transfer assets between different games, or wider marketplaces. Digital gaming assets earned in Yooldo can be sold or traded for tokens with real-world value, extending their utility beyond gameplay. No matter where you are in your web3 gaming journey, MetaMask continues to offer more ways to stay secure.

Ready to dive into web3 gaming? Head to Yooldo to get started.
